description:
We are excited to announce the first meetup for 2024 which will be held at the Lloyds Banking Group offices located on the harbourside.

We will be joined by Lloyds' very own [Rich James](https://www.linkedin.com/in/richgojames/) and [Simon Green](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sg01423/) who will be doing a joint talk titled "SRE in Financial Services (by the book)".

This session will be followed up by [Matt Day](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mattsday/) and [Aly "Alfy" ElAlfy](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aalfy/) who will be taking the community through "Google's Maturity to SRE Capability and Tooling".

Details for the event:

📍 - Lloyds Offices - 10 Canons Way, Bristol, BS1 5LF
🗓️ 27th March
🕠 18:30 kick off
📢 Presentation Event
🍕🍺/🥤 Food and drink provided

Looking forward to welcoming everyone on the evening!
title: 2024 Bristol DevOps and Cloud Native Kick-off Event
